comment.body:
Hello,
As far as I understand, this is your report - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/130449#issuecomment-1255840957
If so, could you please ensure that `AdGuard Advanced Blocking` is enabled in Safari`s settings - Extensions (if not, please enable it).
Then please open AdGuard for Safari, update filters (wait about 30-60 seconds until updating process will be finished), refresh website few times and then check if issue still occurs.

comment.body:
@piquark6046 Could you please take a look?
It seems that it's caused by this rule:
```adblock
||polink-static-contents.polarisoffice.com^
```
from `List-KR`.

https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/blob/1f90d7fd8ff3cb42b88089acb6d9ee1b6b58cd14/filters-AG/desktop/windows_app/specific_URL.txt#L8

comment.body:
I cannot reproduce it.

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/130520#issuecomment-1256952113 - Please check if you have `Allow access to search page results` option enabled in Opera - Extension settings (like on a screenshot below)?

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/29142494/186833697-65bf2088-86be-40e5-bfaf-b4b9f54d7421.png)

</details>

<hr>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/130520#issuecomment-1257503484 - Please disable `Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion`.

comment.body:
Мы не блокируем этот сайт, у меня открывается с этим DNS

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: ppomppu.co.kr - tracking

comment.body:
`https://s.ppomppu.co.kr/?idno=ppomppu_434667&target=aHR0cDovL3d3dy4xMXN0LmNvLmtyL3Byb2R1Y3RzLzQ1Njg1NDg0MDkvc2hhcmU=&encode=on` [^1] exists on https://www.ppomppu.co.kr/zboard/view.php?id=ppomppu&page=1&divpage=74&no=434667.
This encoded URL can be used for tracking visitors.

---

Other tracking URL can be found on https://ppomppu.co.kr/hotdeal/.
<details>
<summary>`li.item.grid-item.23921848` Screenshot</summary>

![Screensh232](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/98787049/192263751-36e6d1ac-f060-4bf3-ab31-6c7cfa4f796b.png)

</details>

`https://www.ppomppu.co.kr/hotdeal/?act=bridge&no=23921848&url=http%3A%2F%2Fclick.linkprice.com%2Fclick.php%3Fm%3Dcoupang%26a%3DA100211316%26l%3D9999%26l_cd1%3DS%26l_cd2%3Dv%26s%3Dmpage%26tu%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.coupang.com%252Fvp%252Fproducts%252F7958974%253FitemId%253D11966409657%2526vendorItemId%253D3058658009`
The `url` parameter is used for tracking and advertising. However, These URL encoded with `encodeURIComponent` can be useful for ppomppu users.

`http://click.linkprice.com/click.php?m=coupang&a=A100211316&l=9999&l_cd1=S&l_cd2=v&s=mpage&tu=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.coupang.com%2Fvp%2Fproducts%2F7958974%3FitemId%3D11966409657%26vendorItemId%3D3058658009` (decoded with `decodeURIComponent` once.) [^2][^3]



[^1]: The `target` parameter is encoded with Base64. Can be decoded with `atob`.
[^2]: The homepage of https://linkprice.com says "we operate LinkPrice partnership business and LinkPrice online advertisement business.".
[^3]: The `tu` parameter contains `https://www.coupang.com/vp/products/7958974?itemId=11966409657&vendorItemId=3058658009` (decoded with `decodeURIComponent` twice, in the result).

---

 @Alex-302

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
